body_html:
Weights should be contiguous everywhere (filterDescriptor does not have strides parameter). For bn, all auxiliary tensors (savevar, savemean, running averages) should be contiguous, for all rnn variants inputs and outputs should be contiguous. Different convolution algos have different requirements wrt data contiguity, but they should error with CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED if given an input they can't handle. Also, conv and bn performance on non-contiguous inputs can be quite horrible.
@szagoruyko, can you please give an example where you are getting CUDNN_STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR?
